thread.title: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Entertainment Activities Cast Member at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
thread.title_full: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Entertainment Activities Cast Member at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa

author: Michael Ramirez
title: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Entertainment Activities Cast Member at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
text:
One of the best things about staying at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa is partaking in the many on-site activities offered each day. Most of these experiences celebrate the Hawaiian culture, from learning to play ukulele to building miniature canoes for racing. And best of all, most activities are included with your stay!
In the next episode of “ Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana ,” you’ll meet Michelle, one of our entertainment activities cast members who leads arts and crafts, games, pool parties, movie nights and more! Our entertainment cast members can be easily identified throughout the resort by their bright green aloha shirts — and equally bright personalities.
Meet Michelle in the video below:

For a list of activities at Aulani Resort, check out the Daily ‘Iwa . What are you looking forward to on your next Hawaiian vacation?
